GEARCH is making browsing easier with beautiful intuitive design and amazing graphics. It’s easy to access search and will help you find what you want, when you want it right from your computers screen.
 
GEARCH brings about an effortless search experience and makes your browsers homepage simple. It will keep you up to date with the time so you are never late with your plans. Also we provide you with quick links to social networks such as Facebook, Instagram & Twitter.
 
By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the GEARCH Tab Chrome extension and setting Chrome™ New Tab, Homepage takeover and Search to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
